item.title: Crisnail
item.description: http://www.crisnail.com We were responsible for both the design and development of this multilingual website for professional nail products Crisnail, featuring a product showcase and a restricted area for professionals to download instruction and publishing materials. It also features a dynamic Nail studio which generates images for different colors and styles automatically, using a custom programmed Drupal ‘Image style’.
